channel.title: Error When Starting Server
channel.description:
i get this error when i start my server
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 9773" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn2(NPCHandler.java:813) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:24) at server.main(server.java:26) Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1940 Client type: high memory version UserId: 73621442 mod roshan has signed onto server. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1941 Client type: high memory version UserId: 73621442 mod roshan has signed onto server. [/code]
then when people or me try to log on its just a black screen

item.title: Error When Starting Server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“xxnoxx, post:1, topic:22008”]i get this error when i start my server

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 9773" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn2(NPCHandler.java:813) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:24) at server.main(server.java:26) Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1940 Client type: high memory version UserId: 73621442 mod roshan has signed onto server. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1941 Client type: high memory version UserId: 73621442 mod roshan has signed onto server.

then when people or me try to log on its just a black screen[/quote]

The problem is your Autospawn2.cfg.

Either delete it and make a whole new one, or fix the problem in it… You mustve screwed up on some tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Error When Starting Server
item.dc:creator: @Law_Me_pl0x Law_Me_pl0x
item.description:
@Law_Me_pl0x wrote:

There is an error in your client.java . You see where it says “9773”, thats an error code informated into your client.java. Just search around it and edit that code out.

If this isn’t the problem let me know, I may be able to help you out.

Read full topic
